title: Vision in mathematics: motion geometry
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and John Walker
brief_description: Reviews and illustrates three isometric plane transformations (translation, reflection, rotation). Examines some combinations of these operations and includes tables to show the final results.
description: Reviews and illustrates three isometric plane transformations (translation, reflection, rotation). Examines some combinations of these operations and includes tables to show the final results.
